title: Not Satisfied!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Taking on a walk along this road at this time of year is so fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Kotori-san, have you put up a Christmas tree in your home yet?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>We promised to put one up and decorate it next weekend. What about you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>We put it up the other day. But I’m not satisfied!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Not satisfied......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes. I want more...... adventurous and exciting decorations!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>......Adventurous? Then, how about we go look for more ornaments right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Really? Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I hope we can find ornaments that tickle your fancy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
